item.description:
Our November 8 speaker, Jim Richardson, of Richardson and Associates, will share his experiences in developing new products for entrepreneurs and small start-up companies. Jim has new material since he last spoke to us in January of 2007. See http://www.richardson...


Arrive as early as 6:30 to network with others. The meeting starts promptly at 7:00. A map of MIT showing the meeting location is at http://whereis.mit.ed.... Street parking is suggested on Ames Street or Memorial Drive. Most MIT buildings have easy access and are interconnected.

For more about the Inventors Association of New England, visit our website at http://www.inventne.c...
item.name: Inventors Association of New England Monthly Meetup
